title: Financial cyber crime losses in the U.S. 2018 , by victim state
yAxis: Annual loss in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing State, and Annual loss in million U.S. dollars in each State on the y axis.
State California has the highest Annual loss in million U.S. dollars and Massachusetts has the lowest Annual loss in million U.S. dollars.
The lowest value at State Massachusetts is 6.6x times less than the highest value at California.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Annual loss in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of States.
The Annual loss in million U.S. dollars is highest at State California and lowest at State Massachusetts.
The highest State California has 382.24 more Annual loss in million U.S. dollars than the lowest State Massachusetts.
The State California has the highest Annual loss in million U.S. dollars, followed by New York, and Texas. Down to the State Massachusetts which is the lowest.
The State California has 2.87 times more Annual loss in million U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all States, we get total 1572.01.
